fn.p: Funding: Funding for this study was provided by the American Ornithologist's Union (GM), the Animal Behavior Society (GM), the Global Forest Science Initiative (GM; GFS-18-210-228), the Society of Canadian Ornithologists, (GM), the American Museum of Natural History (GM), the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (DN, CG), the Canada Foundation for Innovation (DN, CG), the Ontario Research Fund, and the University of Guelph (DN, GM). The funding agencies had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
